attributes.action: urgently consider a Knighthood for the Honourable Henry Allingham!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a 113 years of age, the Honourable Henry Allingham, has just become the Worlds Oldest Living Man. He has seen and done so much for his country, he has fought in both World Wars and yet he still continues to do more.

I believe his country should give him a Knighthood, NOW and with the utmost of urgency. As if anybody is deserving of a Knighthood, then it is HE, Henry Allingham. A Truly Great British Person.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
